usa: The social networking website Facebook was launched.<sup id="cite_ref-18" class="reference">[18]</sup>
2004 Atlantic hurricane season: Four deadly and damaging hurricanes impacted Florida, killing a combined one hundred people in the United States and producing over $50 billion in damage.[19]
U.S. presidential election, 2004; President George W. Bush was reelected, defeating Democratic Senator John F. Kerry.[20]
